The photo was published on December 8: 2020, in a Facebook post with a caption mentioning Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau sitting in a sit-in with Indians against the anti-farmer black law in Canada.
The photo was shared on multiple social: including Facebook and Twitter, with identical claims in both English and Hindi.
A Google reverse image search found the: 2015, alongside more photos of Trudeau with members of the Sikh community.
The photo was taken at the Gurdwara Sahi: Canada, as mentioned in the photo's caption by Reuters and confirmed by an Ottawa-based Canadian photographer and video producer, Patrick Doyle.
